item.description:
December's event will be a SUNDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: The Writing ABC: Submitting

For the rest of the year, we will discuss the writing basics. This month we will tackle submitting your work to be published.

Agenda:

4:00 Names. What's the worst thing that happened when you submitted something?
Topic: Submitting

December Challenge: Bring a rejection slip!
Writing Prompt: (TBD)

5:00 Break
Book / Magazine Offerings
Open Discussions

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction Writers December Meetup
